extension of existing compilers by sophisticated use of macrosa description is presented of an applicationin which macros and string concatenation were employed to add a new facility to belfap.cacm september 1964benett r k.neumann h d.ca640904 jb march 9 1978 6:13 pm1007 5 10071007 5 10071007 5 10071781 5 10071788 5 1007123 6 1007196 6 1007919 6 1007990 6 10071006 6 10071007 6 10071007 6 10071046 6 10071131 6 10071139 6 10071140 6 10071149 6 10071198 6 10071215 6 10071223 6 10071265 6 10071303 6 10071323 6 10071358 6 10071366 6 10071421 6 10071460 6 10071462 6 10071463 6 10071467 6 10071468 6 10071477 6 10071491 6 10071496 6 10071531 6 10071535 6 10071565 6 10071601 6 10071602 6 10071613 6 10071614 6 10071626 6 10071641 6 10071787 6 10071788 6 1007205 6 1007205 6 1007224 6 1007249 6 1007288 6 1007316 6 1007381 6 1007398 6 100711 6 1007404 6 1007410 6 1007463 6 1007464 6 1007483 6 10073184 6 10073188 6 10073189 6 1007584 6 1007600 6 1007680 6 1007691 6 1007763 6 1007799 6 1007
